languages.text: "Мне была открыта карта Простора еще до того, как Море Душ разбушевалось и перемешало все пути. Как могли вы, отчаянные, без {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}навигатора{/g} достичь Футфола, отбыв из самой системы Кранах?"

traits.locale_text: "Мне была открыта карта Коронуса еще до того, как Море Душ разбушевалось и перемешало все пути. Как могли вы, отчаянные, без Навигатора достичь Футфола, отбыв из самой системы Кранах?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "The map of the Expanse was revealed to me before the Sea of Souls roiled and tangled the paths. How did you, desperate ones, reach Footfall all the way from the Cranach System without a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}?"
languages.original_text: "Мне была открыта карта Простора еще до того, как Море Душ разбушевалось и перемешало все пути. Как могли вы, отчаянные, без {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}навигатора{/g} достичь Футфола, отбыв из самой системы Кранах?"

traits.locale_text: "The map of the Koronus had been revealed to me before the Sea of Souls roiled and tangled the paths. How did you, desperate ones, reach Footfall all the way from the Cranach system without a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The map of the Koronus had been revealed to me before the Sea of Souls roiled and tangled the paths. How did you, desperate ones, reach Footfall all the way from the Cranach system without a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The map of the Koronus was revealed to me before the Sea of Souls roiled and tangled the paths. How did you, desperate ones, reach Footfall all the way from the Cranach System without a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The map of the Koronus was revealed to me before the Sea of Souls roiled and tangled the paths. How did you, desperate ones, reach Footfall all the way from the Cranach System without a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The map of the Expanse was revealed to me before the Sea of Souls roiled and tangled the paths. How did you, desperate ones, reach Footfall all the way from the Cranach System without a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「エクスパンスの地図は魂の海が道をかき乱す前に私に明らかにされました。絶望的な状況にいたお前たちが、{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}なしでどうやってクラナッハ星系からフットフォールまでたどり着けたのだ？」
languages.original_text: "The map of the Expanse was revealed to me before the Sea of Souls roiled and tangled the paths. How did you, desperate ones, reach Footfall all the way from the Cranach System without a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: 「エクスパンスの地図は魂の海が道をかき乱す前に私に明らかにされました。絶望的な状況にいたお前たちが、{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}なしでどうやってクラナッハ星系からフットフォールまでたどり着けたのだ？」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我原本对科罗努斯扩区的道路了如指掌，但灵魂之海却搅乱了那些航线。至于你们这些走投无路之人，你们究竟是如何在没有{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}的情况下，从克兰纳克星系一路来到落脚港的？”
languages.original_text: "The map of the Expanse was revealed to me before the Sea of Souls roiled and tangled the paths. How did you, desperate ones, reach Footfall all the way from the Cranach System without a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: “我原本对科罗努斯扩区的道路了如指掌，但灵魂之海却搅乱了那些航线。至于你们这些走投无路之人，你们究竟是如何在没有{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}的情况下，从克兰纳克星系一路来到落脚港的？”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Yo pude ver el mapa de la Extensión antes de que se agitara el mar de almas y fuera imposible navegar. ¿Cómo habéis podido vosotros, pobres almas, arribar a Paso desde el sistema Cranach sin {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navegante{/g}?».
languages.original_text: "The map of the Expanse was revealed to me before the Sea of Souls roiled and tangled the paths. How did you, desperate ones, reach Footfall all the way from the Cranach System without a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: «Yo pude ver el mapa de la Extensión antes de que se agitara el mar de almas y fuera imposible navegar. ¿Cómo habéis podido vosotros, pobres almas, arribar a Paso desde el sistema Cranach sin {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navegante{/g}?
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « La carte des Étendues m'a été dévoilée avant que la Mer des Âmes ne s'agite et brouille les chemins. Comment avez-vous réussi à atteindre Castel depuis le système de Cranach sans l'aide d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateur{/g} ? »
languages.original_text: "The map of the Expanse was revealed to me before the Sea of Souls roiled and tangled the paths. How did you, desperate ones, reach Footfall all the way from the Cranach System without a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: « La carte des Étendues m'a été dévoilée avant que la Mer des Âmes ne s'agite et brouille les chemins. Comment avez-vous réussi à atteindre Castel depuis le système de Cranach sans l'aide d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateur{/g} ? »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Die Karte der Ausdehnung wurde mir offenbart, bevor das Meer der Seelen in Aufruhr versetzt wurde und die Wege durcheinander gerieten. Wie konntet Ihr Verzweifelte den ganzen Weg vom Cranach-System bis Footfall finden – ohne {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}?"
languages.original_text: "The map of the Expanse was revealed to me before the Sea of Souls roiled and tangled the paths. How did you, desperate ones, reach Footfall all the way from the Cranach System without a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: "Die Karte der Ausdehnung wurde mir offenbart, bevor das Meer der Seelen in Aufruhr versetzt wurde und die Wege durcheinander gerieten. Wie konntet Ihr Verzweifelte den ganzen Weg vom Cranach-System bis Footfall finden – ohne {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Enginlik'in haritası, Ruhlar Denizi çalkalanıp yolları karıştırmadan önce elime geçmişti. Siz zavallılar Cranach Sistemi'nden Binliman'a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacınız{/g} olmadan nasıl ulaştınız?"
languages.original_text: "The map of the Expanse was revealed to me before the Sea of Souls roiled and tangled the paths. How did you, desperate ones, reach Footfall all the way from the Cranach System without a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: "Enginlik'in haritası, Ruhlar Denizi çalkalanıp yolları karıştırmadan önce elime geçmişti. Siz zavallılar Cranach Sistemi'nden Binliman'a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacı{/g}'nız olmadan nasıl ulaştınız?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
